"Hello, this is Lisa of Lisa's Swallower rent, how may I help you?" You say into the phone.

"Well hello, I would like you to come to
151.title: Lisa....

choices: An extremely fat woman
A pudgy yet curvy teenage girl
A skinny college aged girl
1513.content:
"Hello Lisa, we have seen your résumé and would like to offer you a job as an interactive sideshow. You would be eaten by guests, and then crawl out their asses, leaving everyone amused. Additionally, you will be swallowed by the RingWoman at the beginning of the show, only to crawl out of her. Don't worry though, we are willing to pay you a yearly salary of $200,000 as compensation for your talents." A feminine voice tells you.

"Why it would be an honor, when do I go?" You ask the woman.

"Right now would be ideal." Says your employer as you head out the door towards the big top. You arrive and walk towards the information booth, about to ask whenever the voice you recognized from the phone approached you. "Welcome Lisa! I am the RingWoman, or as you can call me Anne. I will direct you to the sideshow for your start." You then follow the curvy brunette woman in her early thirties to a pavilion where you see all the other stereotypical sideshow acts.

You walk past these as Anne stops at a tent which is larger than the rest, labeled 'Undigestible Girl (INTERACTIVE EXHIBIT) you walk inside the cloth to see a couch and three chairs. Anna then tells you, "I'm going to let you do you, so get to work and don't forget to attend the main show at 8:00. Have fun!" She walks out of the tent as you sit down.

You are there with a teenage girl who obviously is a minimum wage paid careless student with a summer job. She then places an open sign outside as the first guest walks in to the tent. You brace for your first paid swallow as you see _______ walk in
1513.title: An interview for the circus

choices: It's time for the main performance
There's another customer
15132.content:
In walks a 5'5 blonde teenager who looks like she is an experienced swallower. She is chewing gum, and on her phone.

"Welcome! You will eat lovely Lisa here, and then wait in this seat for thirty minutes. Then, Lisa will squeeze out of your anus, unharmed! All this is true or your money back!" The employee says to your predator.

"Alright. You look pretty yummy Lisa. Let's go." Says the teenager as she places her open lips over your head. You feel the warmth of her body as the saliva gets in your eyes and she works her way deeper, getting your breasts to rest on her tongue as your feet are lifted off the ground. She takes another swallow, sending your body up to the knees inside her esophagus. You are finished off as she pushes your heels down her throat with a shove withe her tongue.

You plop into her stomach as you see a cowering woman in the corner. She is about thirty years of age and crying in terror.

"Who are you?" You ask the woman.

"I was Amanda's biology teacher, and I gave her a D." She said trembling. You shrug it off as you wedge yourself through the intestines of the teenage girl like you had done so many other times as a favor for friends. You sit in the horrid stench of her colon as you spot multiple skulls indulged in human feces, too disgusted to observe for long.

You push off with your feet as you see the puckered light of air. You crawl your way out of the girl, and emerge headfirst into the world you love most. You stick your arms out of the girls anus and peel back the teens panties, pulling yourself out of the prison known as a chubby teen's digestive track. You plop onto the floor as the worker that manages your station tells you
15132.title: Curvy Treat

info.brief_description: This gives people a grand example of how, shrink or vore, is suppose to be done.
info.description:
The do not add line is gone, so you can add to this interactive.

         This interactive is to show what a true shrink or vore interactives is to be like. This is for the great classic fans of same-size vore and shrink stories. The people that are tired of all the guy on guy stuff. Tired of the cartoon, game, anime, and TV show characters. This is for the people what to bring back the good old days of outstanding real like life interactives, also for people that can't stand all the stupid animals and animal people, also bugs and insects that pollute interactives on this site. This is an interactive for people that want rules and structure that keep the interactive perfect and clean of all the bad things I mentioned.
         If you are lazy and won't make your editions grammatically correct or use spell check programs, do not add, because I am tired of editing. Also do not add unless you have read the chapters that came before the one you are making. I don't what the character to be one place with certain people, then in the next edition, all of a sudden he is in a different place with different people. Don't change names of characters.

RULES: Follow all of them, or I will delete.

1.)NO gay stuff. If the main character of the story is a guy, there are to be no other guy characters. Now if the main character is a girl, it is just fine to have other girls, because girl on girl interaction is awesome. But there can be only one guy in a scene at a time. If you want to add another guy, the first guy has to leave, die, whatever, just don't have two guys in one scene.
2.)Okay this is important, because the things I point out should never be in shrink or vore interactives. The things that are not to be in this interactive never in any other interactive are, cartoon, game, anime, and TV show characters, also animals, animal people, bugs, and insects.
3.)If you want to add a new character, the age range is 15 to 37 for girls and women, and 15 to 26 for guys. Also if a woman is a mother, she has to at least 36, no younger.
4.)The shrunken characters are to be 4 inches in height.
5.)Editions are to be written in the third person. Example, "Jason swallowed her whole. She was delicious."
6.)Editions must be at least a paragraph long, at least seven sentences. They must be good sentences, nothing wimpy like, "He climbed up." That sentence would be better written like this, "He climbed up on the table, but almost didn't make it because he about ran out of energy." Now that is a good sentence.
7.)All editions before they are added, are to be spell checked using a word processing program, not the spell check on this site.
8.)Lastly, when you make a new edition, make a creative title, don't use what it puts in the title blank, because that is the choice was written as, and choice writing doesn't fit as a title.
